TEXT.S:
= George Konrote ( Â·) = Mntucing hngkawas 1947 idas 12 jiyax 26 ka George Konrote ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Fiji ta sayang o kiya ka George Konrote, pnaah hngkawas 2015 idas 11 jiyax 12 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan.
= Jioji Konrote (.) = Jioji Konousi Konrote Sawcyang OF MC (kari Fiji: Jioji Konousi Konrote; kngkawas 1947 idas 12 diyax 26- ), hiya ka taxa Fiji cyuns mi seyjicya, Fiji Tu1 Tang tangweyn, kngkawas 2015 mniq kcka Fiji Gikay cida wada wewan seyngkyo burah Soto Fiji, idas 11 diyax 12 muda psdhuwan phiyu.
